name: YOU DON'T KNOW JACK Vol. 2
description: Reintroduce yourself to this classic YDKJ sequel! All the fun of Volume 1, but with completely different questions, host, and smell! YOU DONâ€™T KNOW JACK Volume 2 is the mutant offspring of the original award-winning, irreverent, fast-paced trivia game where you are a contestant on a manic game show.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: 500 MHz processor or faster Memory: 128 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 655 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: The game runs at 640x480 max resolution.  Manually adjust your Desktop resolution if you want the game to fill the screen.

reviews.review_text: I've had fun playing this game for over 15 years, and it continues to be fun. I enjoy playing the solo games, but I like 'screwing' my friends over and forcing them to attempt to answer quetions they don't know the answers to. Jack Attack is probably the thing I'm best at, both with knowledge and with fast fingers!

Based on the Lite Retail version of the Windows 95 Promoware on the YDKJ Vol.1 Disc, I used to beat the Lite Version Time & Again. Those were good times for me & the best Volume in the YOU DON'T KNOW JACK CD-ROM Trivia Series.

There is nothing quite as fun as gathering friends and/or family and have a go at comedic trivia that's also pretty clever at times, and seeing who can understand what they are asking about. So many good times...
